TEXT.TITLE: NOVO INDUSTRI A/S (NVO.CO) YEAR 1986
TEXT.BODY: Pre-tax income 788 mln Danish crowns vs 872 mln Sales 4.21 billion crowns vs 4.11 billion Income after tax 521 mln crowns vs 604 mln Earnings per 20-crown share 20.45 crowns vs 23.79 Dividend 20 pct (unchanged). Reuter
